name: Pixel Tanks (EthanVB123)
description:
In a distant land, there is an adventurer who keeps failing to beat a dungeon, so he has built a tank to beat the dungeon for him! However, due to his repeated failures, he has no money...

Maybe, the loot from the monsters could go into upgrading the tank, so you can finally beat the dungeon once and for all!

All controls are explained in-game.

Credits:

Ethan van Bruchem - coding, creating assets, some music, most of the project

Jim Hall - music track "Wanderlust" used under CC BY 4.0 licence, acquired from https://freemusicarchive.org/music/jim-hall/synth-kid-elsewhere/wanderlust

Enjoy the Game, Ethan van Bruchem
